body.name: Dr.Hows Twinkle Mini Camping Stove Burner - Portable Butane Stove for Camping, Picnic, Outdoor - Single Burner Camp Stove with Carrying Case - Mint
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 47 mins
features: Portable Compact Design: CSA-certified portable gas stove burner comes in a travel-friendly compact form yet powerful in flame distribution and resistant to the wind; Included PP material storage case with durable top handle offers ease of storing and transportation

Butane canister operated: This ready for instant enjoyment camping equipment requires a standard size 8oz butane canister; With a simple insertion, aligning, and locking the canister safely in place, our portable stove is quick to utilize and fast-changeable, so you never run out of the heat

Advanced safety systems: To protect kids and other users, this camping burner comes armed with a child lock; Additionally, dual safety features include gas-cut-off reset button activation if the gas container gets over pressured and the ball release through the hole when the secondary safety device is activated

Easy-clean integrated top plate: Our camping cooking gear comes in a uniquely novel design where the burner hole is separated with the integrated top plate; This practical feature allows for the outdoor cooking stove to be easily cleaned as there is no separate gas cover

SUPERIOR THERMAL EFFICIENCY: Utilizing the piezoelectric ignition method, this small camping stove produces 6,200 BTU of cooking power with tornado-shaped flames for more potent firepower than other portable burners on the market; With less heat loss and superior resistance to the wind, this is the best gas burner for cooking outdoor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and aesthetically pleasing!
reviews.reviewText: I know it comes with a container for storage but it’s just wayyyy too cute to put away! I have it in my kitchen on display! I tried it once and just as others have stated it seems to have great power. If anything changes I’ll definitely update ✨🎀🎀✨The color looks just like it does in the pictures. A true gorgeous pastel pink✨🎀the power is amazing!🎀✨I felt slight bumps? On the paint job as others have noted. But I don’t see a huge defect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The burner might be too small for some people.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am happy and satisfied with the purchase. It was cute and small enough for easy storage! Kinda pricey but not regretting of buying it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Instagram worthy!!! Can't wait to grill toast with it!
reviews.reviewText: Although I received 1 with significant cosmetics defects, I really like the box it came with, and how cute it is. Looks very streamlined, easy to clean. Very instagram. Can't wait to receive my replacement.I believe their QC is very strict. The defects look to me, as a model maker in college, someone drops the drip dish and use a hand filer to sand it, and he popped it back to the package when no one saw him LOL (He basically sanded off the paint)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this little burner!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this thing a couple years ago and we love it! Super lightweight for 2+ person camping trips (We have a family of five) and butane canisters are cheap, easy to find, and in my opinion, last longer and burn cleaner than propane. This burner is foolproof, no wacky contraptions or confusing instructions. Just lift the lid, pop the new canister in, twist, and put the lid back on. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because sometimes when its really windy, the flames disperse unevenly. I like to put something behind it to block the wind. Other than that I have no complaints about this thing, I was looking for a cute, easy to clean, easy to store burner and this was it! I like the carrying case too, and it doesn't need very long to cool off to store it away. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional
reviews.reviewText: I got the cream last year and finally treated myself to the pink. Very cute, great flame control, and the carrying case is an excellent touch. I take this car camping all the time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not last long, malfunctioned dangerously
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this little stove and used it pretty regularly. At first I loved it because of its compact size and the aesthetics. However, by the time I hit the 2-year mark with it, it started having major problems: As others have observed, it does not last long at all, and the price point is not worth the short lifespan, especially if you are having to constantly replace it.Also worth noting: When it started malfunctioning, it was leaking gas, and when I tried to use the stovetop, flames would shoot out the sides in front of the unit instead of up into the little stovetop. This ended up singeing everything that was around the stove. At first I thought it was a fluke but then it started happening regularly, and I realized the stove was malfunctioning.I contacted the seller and they were not helpful at all; they (rather condescendingly) told me to read the manual, and then refused to do anything about it because it was past the return window. They refused to stand behind their product, and instead are basically selling something disposable that you will have to re-purchase every year or so. It’s a cute stove definitely, but it’s just not worth it if you’re going to actually use it.PS- I also noticed that it had started rusting a bunch by the end of the first year. Kept it indoors so that’s weird. Almost didn’t notice it but when you look closely, you can see the inside rusted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2022

reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and works great, this is the best price I found online
